001
002import java.io.File;
003
004/**
005 * collect bad lyric files
006 *
007 * @author matecsaba
008 */
009public class badLyric {
010
011    /**
012     * the main
013     *
014     * @param args arguments
015     */
016    public static void main(String[] args) {
017        String s = "./";
018        if (args.length > 0) {
019            s = args[0];
020        }
021        playerUtil.put("processing " + s + "...");
022        File[] fl = new File(s).listFiles();
023        if (fl == null) {
024            return;
025        }
026        for (int i = 0; i < fl.length; i++) {
027            String a = fl[i].getName();
028            if (a.startsWith(".")) {
029                continue;
030            }
031            if (!fl[i].isDirectory()) {
032                continue;
033            }
034            doDir(s + a);
035        }
036    }
037
038    private static void doDir(String s) {
039        File[] fl = new File(s).listFiles();
040        int q = 0;
041        for (int i = 0; i < fl.length; i++) {
042            String a = fl[i].getName();
043            if (a.equals(".")) {
044                continue;
045            }
046            if (a.equals("..")) {
047                continue;
048            }
049            if (fl[i].isDirectory()) {
050                delFile(s + "/" + a, true);
051                continue;
052            }
053            int o = a.lastIndexOf(".");
054            if (o < 0) {
055                continue;
056            }
057            String b = a.substring(o, a.length()).toLowerCase() + ".";
058            if (".cue.".indexOf(b) >= 0) {
059                delFile(s + "/" + a, false);
060                continue;
061            }
062            if (".mp4.avi.mov.flv.mkv.ini.torrent.url.pdf.rtf.doc.docx.ppt.pptx.exe.db.iso.log.txt.m3u.m3u8.pls.log.jpg.jpeg.png.gif.tif.nfo.sfv.tags.".indexOf(b) >= 0) {
063                delFile(s + "/" + a, true);
064                continue;
065            }
066            if (!b.equals(".lyric.")) {
067                q++;
068                continue;
069            }
070            playerLyric res = playerUtil.readup(s + "/" + a);
071            if (res == null) {
072                delFile(s + "/" + a, true);
073                continue;
074            }
075            int p = res.justWords().length();
076            res = res.clearScript();
077            b = res.justWords();
078            if (b.length() != p) {
079                if (b.trim().length() < 1) {
080                    delFile(s + "/" + a, true);
081                    continue;
082                }
083                playerUtil.put("upd " + s + "/" + a);
084                playerUtil.saveas(res, s + "/" + a);
085            }
086            b = a.substring(0, o + 1);
087            p = -1;
088            for (o = 0; o < fl.length; o++) {
089                if (o == i) {
090                    continue;
091                }
092                if (!fl[o].getName().startsWith(b)) {
093                    continue;
094                }
095                p = o;
096                break;
097            }
098            if (p >= 0) {
099                continue;
100            }
101            delFile(s + "/" + a, true);
102        }
103        if (q > 0) {
104            return;
105        }
106        delFile(s, true);
107    }
108
109    private static void delFile(String s, boolean d) {
110        playerUtil.put((d ? "del" : "wrn") + " " + s);
111        if (!d) {
112            return;
113        }
114        new File(s).delete();
115    }
116
117}
